tasks.prompt: Read the story and choose the correct answer.

context.title: A Day at the Zoo
body: Today, I went to the zoo. I saw a lion and an elephant.
The lion was sleeping under a tree. It looked very big.
An elephant was drinking water from a pond. It was very happy.
I also saw a monkey. The monkey was eating a banana.
There was a bird in a cage. The bird was singing a song.
I had a great time at the zoo. I want to go back again.
I took a picture of the lion and the elephant.
The monkey made me laugh. It was very funny.
I bought a toy elephant for my friend.
It was a wonderful day at the zoo!

tasks.prompt: Practice using articles 'a', 'an', and 'the' in a conversation.

scenario.summary: You are ordering food and drinks. Use articles correctly in your conversation.

roles.name: Student 1
roles.details: You want to order a sandwich and a coffee. Remember to use articles.

roles.name: Student 2
roles.goal: Take the order and ask questions.
roles.details: You will ask about the food and drinks. Use articles in your questions.

steps: Student 1 greets Student 2 and asks for the menu.
Student 2 offers a sandwich and a coffee, using articles.
Student 1 orders a sandwich and a coffee, using 'a' and 'the'.
Student 2 confirms the order and asks if Student 1 wants anything else.
